website_summaries.verdict: This organizer is compact enough for personal use, yet spacious enough to hold a handful of office supplies. An excellent multitasker, but if your car is your office, you might want to consider a larger option.
pros: Roomy inner pockets are ideal for files, folders, and paperwork
Front pockets provide easy access to smaller items
Side pockets double as bottle holders
Sturdy construction and deep pockets work together to prevent sagging
cons: Some think it is smaller than expected
Side pockets are on the shallow side

customer_reviews.title: Get it. It is great!!
customer_reviews.text: My job requires a lot of travel.. I was looking for something "compact" and streamlined that would allow me to organize paperwork, my iPad, and other accessories without taking up floor or seat space. This organizer is great. Highly recommend it to anybody that is constantly on the road.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed it for.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking (and looking) for a car organizer to use in my patrol car. I have used the big, bulky, hard to move, plastic one. All I need it for is my metal folder and ticket book. This is perfect. Doesn't take up too much of the seat and holds my books perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Prada

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't get it again
customer_reviews.text: As a home health nurse, my job is in my car. If i’m not organized, my day is shot. I saw this and was hopeful that it would be the answer to my clutter prayers... It’s not. Positives: 1. Made of durable material 2. Several pockets for separating and organizing pens, papers, folders Cons: 1. There are 2 bigger sections for adding folders, papers, books. But these 2 sections aren’t extendable. The sides don’t “give” to allow for expanding. If the largest section is packed tight, there’s no way you can fit anything into the second pocket. It would be so much better if the edges were made with a little more material, to allow for stretching
customer_reviews.author: MomOf2

customer_reviews.title: Sooooo versitile!
customer_reviews.text: I actually didn't buy this for my car...I bought it for my rolling backpack! This backpacks main pocket section was one huge disorganized mess! I only use it for travel and when you fly as much as I do, you need to be able to access anything, very fast as to not inconvenience other passengers, and find what you need in a very small, crunched space. I ABSOLUTELY LOVE THIS PRODUCT, even though I'm using it for something completely different than what it was made for. THANK YOU for making my life easier!
customer_reviews.author: DeAnna

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer
customer_reviews.text: I work out of my car doing home care visits. This allows me to keep my passenger seat clean and tidy, I'm storing my laptop and notebooks in the organizer. It is very easy to either remove the organizer, or swing it behind the passenger seat when you need someone to sit on the passenger side. I'm very happy with it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: wemo

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit smaller than I thought but it seems to be made of some pretty sturdy material and it has an attractive shape. I'm happy that I've finally got more pocket space for my car, and that it doesn't have their brand plastered in the middle, I really appreciate that
customer_reviews.author: SierraG

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My car was a mess. Working in it all day long and never being organized was so frustrating! I had even looked at getting a bigger vehicle. Decided to give this organizer a try. Was disappointed when it arrived. Thought my stuff will never all fit in here! I started with my leather planner that I was SURE wouldn’t fit and it DID! Everything fit! Access is so easy. I love it!!! My life and my car are so much better off!
customer_reviews.author: Philpam

customer_reviews.title: I like this thing--well thought out design and functionality
customer_reviews.text: I like this thing--well thought out design and functionality, I have it hanging from my rear driver's side headrest to keep my front passenger seat open. The hanging strap is adjustable so you can customize the length. Overall its made from a decent material, although I wouldn't say its heavy duty. Several pockets and dividers so you can keep things separated and organized, yet handy, and you can easily take it off and go--use it as a tote if desired. Not exactly inexpensive or overly spendy, I think it was a fair price for the item. Only downside for me was a cheapy zipper just above the mesh pockets, but it wasn't a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Da Kine

customer_reviews.title: I like that I don't have to unbuckle it if someone ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this to organize all of my work stuff and my daily travel stuff. I like that I don't have to unbuckle it if someone gets in the front seat, I can just swivel it around to the back. Plenty of pockets for everything up to a full clipboard with maps. My only wish is that the drink pocket was a little deeper to give more support around the container. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Small enough to be un-noticeable but big enough for holding all my stuff. The black color blends right in with my black car interior. When I have a passnger, I just flip the organizer around to the back of the seat. Perfect for collecting loose change, holding a kleenex box, dog leashese, my phone, and any other odds and ends that used to gather on the front seat and then the floor of the car.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Barber

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: My Car Organizer arrived quickly, is very well made and a good size for my small SUV. I use it in the front or flip it to the back when I have a passenger. Excellent quality of materials and construction (holds its shape & does not sag like some others). It did cost a bit more than some of the other organizers, but I have found that you do get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Duffy

customer_reviews.title: Clears the clutter
customer_reviews.text: This is a clever invention. I'm a commuter who spends a lot of time in my vehicle, and I often have multiple items taking up space in my car. This organizer takes care of the clutter problem. The box of Kleenex I bought for it is too big--I need to buy a travel size. Other than that, now I know where everything is. Turning it around when I had my first passenger after purchase was not as smooth as I hoped. But it worked.
customer_reviews.author: AJ Biel

customer_reviews.title: Looking Good
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for me. Not too big, but holds all my essentials and helps keep my car neat. I just had it detailed and the organizer will help me keep my commitment to keeping car interior looking great. I already had a container for trash that looks very similar to the organizer. So, the organizer hangs over the front of the passenger seat and the trash bag hangs over the back of the passenger seat.
customer_reviews.author: Kip

customer_reviews.title: smaller seat organizer provides clearance over autodesk
customer_reviews.text: For many years I used a front seat organizer that was larger, heavier-duty, and of more durable construction than this item, but it was really larger than I needed and interfered with opening the files section of my car desk. This organizer is adequate for the things I typically carry and with the strap cinched up tightly around the headrest it stays clear of the top of the lid over my files. It was very inexpensive. so far I have only used it for about a month; time will tell whether or not it is sturdy enough.
customer_reviews.author: Christine C.

customer_reviews.title: I like that this organizer is up off the seat and ...
customer_reviews.text: I like that this organizer is up off the seat and floor. It makes it easy to store and reach items. It has plenty of room to store items that you may need on a regular basis in your car. I keep hand sanitizer, note pad and pen, kleenex, snacks, and there is plenty of room to hold more. I can easily swing it to the back of the seat if I have a passenger.
customer_reviews.author: Emily H

customer_reviews.title: So Much Storage
customer_reviews.text: When I first opened the package I was disappointed because it was smaller than I anticipated and I was afraid it could not be useful. Well I could not have been more wrong. The amount of storage in this little bag is amazing. The quality is good and I think I will be using it for a long time to come.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Clanton

customer_reviews.title: Great place to put Stuff
customer_reviews.text: This is used daily in my patrol car it gets fast food, coffee, and various fluid spilled all ove it. just take it out of the vehicle throw it in the washer and it's ready for the next trip. I Constantly put way to much in it.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie Merritt

customer_reviews.title: Great work truck storage!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a place to store paperwork, extra notebooks and pens in the backseat of my work truck. It makes access to this material easy with lots of storage and it keeps things off the dash or under the center console.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: The product fits perfectly in my car! It has an adjustable strap if needed and is made of sturdy material. It has several pockets for organizing my things. It is just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: useful!
customer_reviews.text: Lots of different pickets/zipper compartments. Easy to throw in trunk w/everything still in it when park/have passenger. I wish the side drawstring pocket were a little wider, my superoversized sunglass case doesn't fit, but slimmer regular ones do - and wish it could expand a little more in front pocket for bulky fruit snacks, but my ipad and a pile of magazines fit great along with small slim stuff.
customer_reviews.author: AAA Athlete

customer_reviews.title: worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to compartmentalize my normal travel office as I am out in the field alot and like to keep my passenger seat free.. Happy with my purchase and recommend; as I have had 2 other styles prior and this more suits needs..and is very streamlined without sacrificing compartments needed
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy organizer.
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Needed it for work as I'm always driving with a lot of documents. Great organizer. When I have a passenger in the front seat I easily doing it to the back.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Williams

customer_reviews.title: Not as It Appears
customer_reviews.text: This item is very small and zipper was broke when I received it. The only reason I gave it two stars is because the company did reach out to me to see if I was satisfied with the item before I received it. It was a total disappointment, so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Foxworth

customer_reviews.title: Simple and effective organizer
customer_reviews.text: It fits perfectly onto the folding armrest between the seats and has decluttered the seats of sunglasses, cellphone ear cords and notes. Now there's no more mess. Yay!
customer_reviews.author: S. Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Very good choice
customer_reviews.text: I work in law enforcement and needed something to hold my 10-50 book and ticket book plus a few random items. I’m glad I bought this one. It’s perfect and doesn’t take up a lot of space.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Kleiboeker

customer_reviews.title: Husband needed this!
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for my husband. He is a truck driver and needed something to organize his stuff. Love this one. Lots of pockets and well made. He says it makes his life easier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Hanging Organizer!
customer_reviews.text: My husband works from his car most days and since he has a lot of business items to keep organized, we got him a large organizer for the trunk and this one for the front seat. He loves it and it holds his portfolio, laptop, pens, paper, business cards, etc. It can easily be flipped to the back of the seat for when I'm riding in his car too and I like not having to clear off the passenger seat like I used to! ;)
customer_reviews.author: Jes P

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. I've been looking for something like this. It holds my wet wipes, hand sanitizer, a few pairs of sunglasses, a lint roller and some other random things that were just laying around my car before. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Cwild2013

customer_reviews.title: Handy to hold things accessible and not rolling around on the seat or floor of the car!
customer_reviews.text: Use mine hanging on the front of the passenger’s seat, rotate to the side or back if I have a passenger.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Sue

customer_reviews.title: Very handy and convenient
customer_reviews.text: Working in the field as a hospice nurse, my car is my office. This very handy organizer fits beautifully on the passenger side and holds all my essentials. Lots of pockets and sections for folders, mileage books and my computer. Receipt was prompt and contents in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: organizes and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: this organizer has solved my organizational problems - so glad I bought it. It holds all sorts of things and when I have a passenger in the front seat I simply turn it around to the back of the front seat= works like a charm- best buy for me in a long time
customer_reviews.author: LF

customer_reviews.title: Think Clean Car Front Seat Organizer
customer_reviews.text: I would like you to know that I am very pleased with my purchase. It makes storing things in my van so much easier. Now I don't have things all over the place and squished in to this place or that one. And whenever I need anything I can just flip it around from the rear of the seat to the front of the seat. I would highly recommend this product for anyone who is looking for minimal storage.
customer_reviews.author: Erika M. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my work truck to be more organized and it is amazing. I love it!!! It sits perfectly and was no hassle to put it on the head rest of the seat. I would definitely order again
customer_reviews.author: neeva

customer_reviews.title: Great for police cruisers!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband who uses it in his police cruiser. He loves it! He said it is a great size for all of his pens, documents, and ticket pad. He is very happy that his car is nice and neat and all of his important items are easily accessible. He was initially worried about the size but it was able to hold much more than he thought. Would definitely recommend for law enforcement.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Simple but Effective Design... Holds An Entire Office!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product!!! When I first got it, it looked a little small. But it held everything securely. It was a gift for my beau who is a contractor. He works out of his car and everything important seemed to become misplaced, make its way into the nether regions of the floorboard, get spills on it, etc. I bought the organizer; filled it with business cards, pens, highlighters, legal pads, clipboards, receipt book, folders, stapler, magnifying glass, ledgers,...and called it his new mobile office. Thanks to thisproduct; documents are surviving, receipts are kept, notes are made, and he has NEVER been more organized.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well in my business truck. I han it ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well in my business truck. I han it on a rear seat. As the pockets on 2015 Silverado are worthless. This organizer solved the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Buhrmann

customer_reviews.title: I am a Home Health Nurse and this is PERFECT for what I do
customer_reviews.text: I am a Home Health Nurse and this is PERFECT for what I do. Our vehicles tend to get cluttered and this was the perfect solution for keeping all my stuff organized. I have everything I need right at my finger tips. A MUST have for nurses on the go! I read one reviewer say it doesn't hold a lot...it holds all I need and more. Best purchase ever!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Jordan

customer_reviews.title: I love this! I love that it can go on ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I love that it can go on either the front or back of the seat (for when I'm not on my own in the car) It also has an amazing amount of pockets! some of which are rather large and can carry anything! It's helped me stay organized a lot better since receiving it. Most everything that was previously in my purse cluttering it up is now here easy for on the go business!
customer_reviews.author: Merry

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my car clean
customer_reviews.text: It’s slightly smaller than I imagined, but it’s still a good size. My car is basically my office and this keeps everything nice and tidy. I’ve had this for about a month and I can’t imagine working without it now. Holds a surprisingly large amount of stuff.
customer_reviews.author: YourMajesty

customer_reviews.title: Fine enough for all my wandering.
customer_reviews.text: I have to carry a lot of small tools for work. Clipboard, various USB drives, labels, zip ties, cutters, knives, pens, etc. My truck is always a mess. Not anymore. This was just the ticket. I thought it was smallish when I pulled it out of the box, surprisingly it seems it's bigger on the inside. (Large enough so that my favorite screwdriver is in there as well as my towel. Always carry a towel. They're incredibly useful.) I am very pleased in the quality and the convenience of this product. I would definitely buy again but barring any failure in its construction I doubt I will have to. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: sseegars

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: My work truck is a part time office so being able to stay organized is a MUST. This sits nicely on the passenger side. Keeps all of my paperwork and manuals organzed without being thrown all over the place and doesn't take up any room.
customer_reviews.author: Bryson

customer_reviews.title: Well designed. Good value.
customer_reviews.text: After a few months, the camouflage faded and turned. The browns became black, the tans became red and the greens faded to a khaki.
customer_reviews.author: bmw325alex

customer_reviews.title: Front Seat Car Organizer
customer_reviews.text: What a great idea. Glad I found this. Been using the front seat and many times paperwork/phone/pens ends up on the floor. Not with this organizer, everything is neatly put away and when away from the car, I just swing it around and have it facing the back seat. Can't been seen from the front window. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Quality durable product-keeps car organized!
customer_reviews.text: This was great during a 3 day road trip-kept all the necessities from rolling around or being hard to find. I still keep it in the car-it is a nice quality product!
customer_reviews.author: Parsonsdeb

customer_reviews.title: Neat and clutter free organizer.
customer_reviews.text: For someone who has OCD and needs to keep things neat and organized this is perfect for keeping my car organized and clutter free. Everything I need is within arms reach and it leaves space for a passenger by flipping it around to the back of the front seat. I would recommend this for anyone who has been contemplating purchasing one.
customer_reviews.author: Jewl

customer_reviews.title: Awesome organizer.
customer_reviews.text: It fits all of my paperwork needed in my patrol unit. Some may need a bigger on, but it is perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Is good for the price, it holds a variety of items inside , keeps you car organized, is good so far
customer_reviews.author: Edward2018

customer_reviews.title: the quality is better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Haven't stocked it yet, but so far, the quality is better than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Hi there hope everyone is well, I just purchased the car organizer and let me tell you it is awesome I use it in my truck, the size is the same as an ambulance and it works great, very pleasantly suprized I use it in reverse having it hang to the rear and it totally freed up my seat that had all my important papers that I have to carry on a daily basis,this is not a bogus review or fake, this product is great and I had a lot I had to organize, ok take care thanks again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Tons of room!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! More space than was expected. I work all day in my truck. It holds everything! Even my laptop fits in it perfectly. If I need to put someone in the passenger seat, I just turn it around to the back of the seat with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, I live and work out of my car
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, I live and work out of my car, so this product has got me organize, and keep my car clean. I am not scratching around trying to find things anymore on my front seat I know exactly where everything is. I am going to go ahead and order 3 more. For my wife and my two kids. I have no hesitation in recommending the front seat, organizer to anyone. Brilliant Jimmy
customer_reviews.author: James O.

customer_reviews.title: Great so far for nursing
customer_reviews.text: I've had this in my car for about a week. Seems to hold up pretty well. Easy to swing to the back seat. Lots of pockets. I'm a hospice nurse and spend most of my time in my car. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Lane

customer_reviews.title: FRONT Seat Organizer
customer_reviews.text: I love this car organizer. However I wanted it to hang on the back of the seat, not the front. When I do that it flops around because the bottom of this organizer is not strapped to the seat. I do wish it had a strap to secure the bottom. In the front its exactly like pictured. And it does hold a lot of items that would be lose in the car. Any suggestions for securing the bottom anyone? Otherwise I'm happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Roga

customer_reviews.title: Very useful, specially for who works with trucks or cars
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband who is a truck driver and he found this very useful to keep all documents and paper classified and not on the seat!
customer_reviews.author: Chantal

customer_reviews.title: Lawyer Brother
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my brother for Christmas. He is a lawyer who drives back and forth from different Court houses so he has lots of files and folders. He really likes it and still uses it attached to the front of the passenger seat
customer_reviews.author: Roberto

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer
customer_reviews.text: Awesome organizer! Just wish it would have been a little bigger since I use it for business while I’m on the road!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonnerrr

customer_reviews.title: Great great product
customer_reviews.text: Great great product! Perfect size, fits my papers clipboard and other extras, but still small in size. Nice soft material, not hard. You can easily fold papers and stick them in pockets
customer_reviews.author: renato

customer_reviews.title: just right for small pick up's
customer_reviews.text: It's just the right size for my Nissan frontier. One of my coworkers saw it and is ordering one as well. Item is as described and prime shipping was right on time. Think I'll buy a larger one for my Silverado.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, I highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my mom. Helps to keep all of her paperwork stored nearly. Great quality, I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn Cobleigh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect organizer for all those little things you used to throw on the front seat!
customer_reviews.text: This is great for keeping all those little things you throw on your front seat from sliding around and falling onto the floor and under the seat. Great for notebooks, calendars, phone, etc. Easy to put in car to use, and remove if you have a passenger. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: OctoberLady

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice
customer_reviews.text: Good little bag. If it was slightly bigger it would be perfect!
customer_reviews.author: NJ

customer_reviews.title: Well made, great amount of storage
customer_reviews.text: This is very well made, durable material, wonderful amount of pockets and adjustable hanging strap. This will be perfect for road trips & organizing documents, maps, small notepads and even drinks.
customer_reviews.author: Xtree

customer_reviews.title: Easy to keep notepads and a folder organized
customer_reviews.text: Easy to keep notepads and a folder organized. Can spin around seat easily if someone needs to ride with me or just remove it. Plus it holds all kinds of small items.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Waybright

customer_reviews.title: Best pockets and depth!
customer_reviews.text: Great size and excellent quality. My husband is particular and works from his truck. This item was a welcome treat for the both of us!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer that  limits  distractions
customer_reviews.text: Great and well-designed front seat organizer. Now I consolidate my stuff where it is arms reach, eliminating the need to scan or feel around. When a front passenger get in, you just flip it around behind the, enabling my stuff still within reach. Very reasonable price too!
customer_reviews.author: jim enriquez

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this for my husband who uses his vehicle ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband who uses his vehicle as his "office" and he loves it! He had been complaining about papers falling into the floor and becoming unorganized; this solved the problem!
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very useful and portable and changeable to wherever in the car you want it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: I pretty much work out of my car. I needed something to organize files and papers that were all over my backseat. This is perfect! It's not too bulky and I love how you can slide it to the back if you have a passenger.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: So helpful for a tidy car!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! So helpful in keeping me organized. I’m in sales so in my car A LOT and I can’t stand for it to be messy. This has helped so much.
customer_reviews.author: MPRyan

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband, he LOVES it! And now his papers, pens, receipts, etc. aren’t all over his truck!!!! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: K. Huggins

customer_reviews.title: Not fancy but practical
customer_reviews.text: I drive a regular cab truck and this is just what I needed clean up my front seat, my only seat. I use my truck as a hotshot rig so there's a lot of paperwork to keep organized along with chargers, flashlights and such. This works fine for me
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It came and very nicely made and would hold alotneatly
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this inorder to create more holding space in car. It came and very nicely made and would hold alotneatly . I however returned because I didn't have as much stuff as I thought so didn't require the room. But if u do this is really nice.
customer_reviews.author: TDW

customer_reviews.title: Love this item
customer_reviews.text: Love this item... as a person who drives a lot for work, I keep a lot of things in my car. this thing provides easy acces for a lot of items... what is also great about this is that I can move everything quickly to the trunk when I'm getting the car cleaned or if I have a passenger I just swivel it around to hang down the back of the passenger chair. Really love it!
customer_reviews.author: Charlo

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly fits everything I need for work daily. Couldn't get through a day without aggravation without it.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. Keeps everything close at had and in order and leaves the seat clear for my little pups bed/
customer_reviews.author: Doris T

customer_reviews.title: sturdy material. Should last a long time
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller than I expected but I should have payed more attention because they're product description and dimensions are correct. Really well made, sturdy material. Should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: J Welks

customer_reviews.title: Love this organizer
customer_reviews.text: Love this organizer. Have a pest control company and not enough room in the bug mobile for the paper work. We now have a place for the appointment book, ticket box and the odds and ends you need for running an office out of the office. Since we don't have a lot of paper work, it's just the right size to keep every thing from sliding around and trying to find it once stopped. Thank you for the quick service also.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy G.

customer_reviews.title: Yea-yuh!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size if you don’t have much more than 2 notepads and 3 small-medium files in the big part. I think this is great! Excellent quality, hangs easily, and offers ample storage for pens, pencils, tape, wite-out, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Pangle

customer_reviews.title: Helps to keep me organized
customer_reviews.text: I work out of my car and this really helps to keep me organized. Nothing is worse than papers all over the seat and falling on the floor. The front pockets are great for pens and small reference books I carry. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: KLBRN

customer_reviews.title: Yeah its good.
customer_reviews.text: Good product, nothing fancy, I'm an LEO and I got this for work. It holds all my basics, ticket cans, ovc log book, some pens, hand held radio, and such. I thought it would be a little bigger but I probably should've read the description a little better. Over all good product
customer_reviews.author: Cale

customer_reviews.title: Great product and highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what my husband needed. He wasn't quite sure what he wanted but this works perfectly for the job he performs as it entails a lot of travel time and stops. Thank you for getting it to us so fast. Great product and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Todd W. Pratt

customer_reviews.title: Gift for hard to buy for man!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my brother in law for Christmas. Men are so hard to buy for! He owns his own landscape company, in truck all day. I'm going he likes it. Came well packed and looks like a good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: HulaJules

customer_reviews.title: Works Good!
customer_reviews.text: I needed some place to store things while I drive around in my car, sunglasses, receipts, papers, snacks, iPad, etc. What I love is that it swings out of the way easily so my wife can ride to church without me having to spend a lot if time moving stuff to the back seat for her to ride and then move it all back on Monday morning.
customer_reviews.author: Howard D. Galletly

customer_reviews.title: My car is like an office for me while I'm traveling between patients
customer_reviews.text: This organizer does exactly what I was hoping it would! I'm a traveling therapist, and I cannot function when I'm not organized. My car is like an office for me while I'm traveling between patients, so this helps me keep everything in its place and I can easily access whatever I need with ease. When I have a front seat passenger, all I have to do is flip it around to the back seat. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must buy for people who need to have a lot of documents with them in their vehicle!
customer_reviews.text: I should have gotten one of these sooner, This thing is excellent for organizing stuff if you have a lot of work stuff you keep in your vehicle, its an absolute must.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for iPads and junk that clutters your cupholders
customer_reviews.text: Expensive for what it is, but does seem a little nicer than the cheaper alternatives. Perfect for iPads and junk that clutters your cupholders. Easy on and off when a passenger needs to use the seat.
customer_reviews.author: SWH

customer_reviews.title: Fits all
customer_reviews.text: Works out very well, all of the things that used to sit on my front seat and slide all over, fit in this and are organized.
customer_reviews.author: David Cheney

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love having the items stored instead of flying around the truck cab. Everything is handy for use.
customer_reviews.author: AZDave

customer_reviews.title: Good item
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what was needed for my truck driving spouse. He needed something to go in the front seat to hold all of his paperwork and pens and this worked perfectly. He loves it and if he is happy I am happy
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: I don't really like this. Have bought several & others are a lot less expensive, just as durable with just as many features. I would not recomend
customer_reviews.author: DWD

customer_reviews.title: Easy, Simple, Holds a lot of stuff for being smaller
customer_reviews.text: Easy, Simple, Holds a lot despite the size. Im glad i purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Country Gal

customer_reviews.title: Help keep things organized so they are falling on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Help keep things organized so they are falling on the floor or sliding off the seat. It’s a pickup truck with bucket seats and a console. I can hang it from the side of the passenger seat facing me, or hang it over the front of the seat.
customer_reviews.author: sam rowe

customer_reviews.title: It fits perfectly on the passenger seat of my Peterbuilt
customer_reviews.text: This thing was what I was looking for. It fits nicely on the passenger seat of my Peterbuilt and I don't have to shuffle around the stuff on the seat anymore... Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: SonnyG

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Will have to buy straps to secure to seat back!
customer_reviews.author: robert slaughter

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this to keep all my miscellaneous items I have floating around like cleaning wipes
customer_reviews.text: I just got a new car and was looking for a way to stay organized since I practically live in my car. I ordered this to keep all my miscellaneous items I have floating around like cleaning wipes, umbrella, etc. He holds everything well and the loops on it mean I can keep it on the back of the seat our of the way when I want to and pull it around to the front when I need it.
customer_reviews.author: Sondra Spalding

customer_reviews.title: Great for those who drive for work
customer_reviews.text: Great organizer. Size exactly as stated. Well made. Will Be used to organize essentials needed while driving for work.
customer_reviews.author: Janell

customer_reviews.title: Picture doesn't give a good idea of the size
customer_reviews.text: Picture doesn't give a good idea of the size. It's smaller than expected. Not really useful for the size of equipment I use
customer_reviews.author: G Waters

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Constructive criticism only.
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time and so far the quality seems excellent. Fits on my seat well. Plenty of space for organization. Very happy with my purchase. It is a bit short of holding a standard file folder, or a notebook as I intended, but I turned them upright and made it work. Make it a bit wider so I can view my file tabs and I'll order one for each of my trucks.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Moore

customer_reviews.title: Nice item. Fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Nice item. Fast delivery. A little smaller than expected but it works for what I need. Holds the essentials.
customer_reviews.author: Badawg

customer_reviews.title: What we needed
customer_reviews.text: Enough pockets to cover the ones I lost after getting a few vehicle. It’s a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

product_meta.title: Think Clean Car Front Seat Organizer (Black -13.8" x 11.5") Mid-Sized Auto Storage for Files, Laptop, Table and Cell Phone | Heavy-Duty Strap and Secure Buckle
product_meta.description:
Do you spend a lot of time in the car, van, SUV or truck? Do you “live” in your vehicle? Are you a commuter or shuttler to all of the kids’ games? Keep all of your essentials handy with a front seat organizer by Think Clean Car. We’re all about making your time in the car as organized and efficient as possible. 

Join hundreds of drivers who have made their car, truck, van or SUV space safe and productive! 

EASY ACCESS: Hang the Think Clean Car Front Seat Organizer from the passenger seat. Keep it in the front or swing it around for second row or back seat passengers 

MULTIPURPOSE: The auto organizer can comfortably hold glasses, magazines, pens and pencils, mobile devices, tablets, planners and notebooks. 

UNIVERSAL USE: This organizer is not only for commuters or casual drivers. Doctors, lawyers, contractors, law enforcement, service workers, students and anyone in between can keep their essentials handy and within arms reach! 

WE LOVE OUR CUSTOMERS. If you aren’t 100% satisfied with our front seat organizer we’ll work with you until you’re happy, including a full and immediate refund. 

Click the BUY or ADD TO CART at the top of this page to start the new tidy and clutter free adventure! **Limited Supply.** 

Start organizing today!
feature_bullets: ORGANIZE TODAY: Store your tablet, water bottle, cell phone, paperwork and lightweight books in one place. No more reaching around to find your sunglasses or pens. Organize the way you want to fit your lifestyle and vehicle - car, truck, van or SUV.

UNIVERSAL USE: Whether you’re the casual driver or road warrior, utilize this car organizer to reduce the clutter and keep your space clean. Perfect organizer for all walks of life and careers - from business commuters to law enforcement, soccer moms and the car office
EASY ACCESS: Hang the front seat organizer on the passenger side and have easy driver access. Passenger in back? Swing it around with convenient side straps.
DURABLE: Made of highly quality polyester. The perfect material for the long hauls and heavy use. Includes Black WATERPROOF carrying it safely from vehicle to door
100% SATISFACTION: We love our customers, and we’re not happy until you’re happy. If you’re not 100% satisfied with your purchase, we’ll send a full refund immediately.
